languages.text: Поговаривают, что богопротивного ксеноса настигла расплата за его жестокость от рук экипажа, который попросту разорвал врага Человечества на куски — ценой жизней десятков храбрецов, рискнувших напасть на смертельно опасную тварь.

People say the hideous xenos faced a reckoning for his savagery at the hands of the crew, who allegedly tore the enemy of Humanity apart at the cost of dozens of lives of those brave enough to attack the wretched creature.
languages.original_text: Поговаривают, что богопротивного ксеноса настигла расплата за его жестокость от рук экипажа, который попросту разорвал врага Человечества на куски — ценой жизней десятков храбрецов, рискнувших напасть на смертельно опасную тварь.

traits.locale_text: People say that the hideous xenos faced the reckoning for his savagery at the hands of the crew — who supposedly tore the enemy of Mankind apart at the cost of dozens of lives of those brave enough to attack the wretched deadly creature.

People say that the hideous xenos faced the reckoning for his savagery at the hands of the crew — who supposedly tore the enemy of Mankind apart at the cost of dozens of lives of those brave enough to attack the wretched deadly creature.

People say the hideous xenos faced a reckoning for his savagery at the hands of the crew, who allegedly tore the enemy of Mankind apart at the cost of dozens of lives of those brave enough to attack the wretched creature.

People say the hideous xenos faced a reckoning for his savagery at the hands of the crew, who allegedly tore the enemy of Mankind apart at the cost of dozens of lives of those brave enough to attack the wretched creature.

People say the hideous xenos faced a reckoning for his savagery at the hands of the crew, who allegedly tore the enemy of Humanity apart at the cost of dozens of lives of those brave enough to attack the wretched creature.

People say the hideous xenos faced a reckoning for his savagery at the hands of the crew, who allegedly tore the enemy of Humanity apart at the cost of dozens of lives of those brave enough to attack the wretched creature.

languages.text: 人们都说那个邪恶的异形在船员手中得到了应得的报应。据说，勇敢的船员付出了数十条生命的代价，撕碎了这个可恶的人类之敌。
languages.original_text: People say the hideous xenos faced a reckoning for his savagery at the hands of the crew, who allegedly tore the enemy of Humanity apart at the cost of dozens of lives of those brave enough to attack the wretched creature.

traits.locale_text: 人们都说那个邪恶的异形在船员手中得到了应得的报应。据说，勇敢的船员付出了数十条生命的代价，撕碎了这个可恶的人类之敌。

languages.text: Es heißt, dass der widerwärtige Xenos von der Crew für seine Brutalität bestraft wurde. Angeblich hat eine Gruppe mutiger Crewmitglieder den Feind der Menschheit in Stücke gerissen, auch wenn dabei Dutzende ihr Leben gelassen haben.
languages.original_text: People say the hideous xenos faced a reckoning for his savagery at the hands of the crew, who allegedly tore the enemy of Humanity apart at the cost of dozens of lives of those brave enough to attack the wretched creature.

traits.locale_text: Es heißt, dass der widerwärtige Xenos von der Crew für seine Brutalität bestraft wurde. Angeblich hat eine Gruppe mutiger Crewmitglieder den Feind der Menschheit in Stücke gerissen, auch wenn dabei Dutzende ihr Leben gelassen haben.

languages.text: On raconte que le hideux xénos paya le prix de sa sauvagerie aux mains de l'équipage. L'infâme ennemi de l'humanité aurait péri en emportant dans la tombe des dizaines de ceux qui avaient eu le courage de s'attaquer à lui.
languages.original_text: People say the hideous xenos faced a reckoning for his savagery at the hands of the crew, who allegedly tore the enemy of Humanity apart at the cost of dozens of lives of those brave enough to attack the wretched creature.

traits.locale_text: On raconte que l'hideux xénos paya le prix de sa sauvagerie aux mains de l'équipage. L'infâme ennemi de l'humanité aurait péri en emportant dans la tombe des dizaines de ceux qui avaient eu le courage de s'attaquer à lui.

languages.text: La gente dice que el horrendo xenos cosechó la brutalidad que había sembrado entre la tripulación, que, según se cuenta, despedazó al enemigo de la Humanidad a costa de decenas de vidas de los valientes que se atrevieron a atacar a la terrible criatura.
languages.original_text: People say the hideous xenos faced a reckoning for his savagery at the hands of the crew, who allegedly tore the enemy of Humanity apart at the cost of dozens of lives of those brave enough to attack the wretched creature.

traits.locale_text: La gente dice que el horrendo xenos cosechó la brutalidad que había sembrado entre la tripulación, que, según se cuenta, despedazó al enemigo de la Humanidad a costa de decenas de vidas de los valientes que se atrevieron a atacar a la terrible criatura.

languages.text: 人々は、この醜悪な異種族は乗組員の手によってその残忍さの報いを受けたと言う。乗組員は、この惨めな生き物を攻撃した勇敢な者たちの何十人もの命を犠牲にして、人類の敵を引き裂いたと言われている。
languages.original_text: People say the hideous xenos faced a reckoning for his savagery at the hands of the crew, who allegedly tore the enemy of Humanity apart at the cost of dozens of lives of those brave enough to attack the wretched creature.

traits.locale_text: 人々は、この醜悪なゼノは乗組員の手によってその残忍さの報いを受けたと言う。乗組員は、この惨めな生き物を攻撃した勇敢な者たちの何十人もの命を犠牲にして、人類の敵を引き裂いたと言われている。

languages.text: İnsanlar, aşağılık zenonun, yarattığı vahşetin cezasını mürettebatın elinde çektiğini söylüyordu. Söylenene göre sefil yaratığa saldıracak kadar cesur olan ekipten onlarcası ölmüş ancak nihayetinde İnsanlığın düşmanını yakalayıp paramparça etmişler.
languages.original_text: People say the hideous xenos faced a reckoning for his savagery at the hands of the crew, who allegedly tore the enemy of Humanity apart at the cost of dozens of lives of those brave enough to attack the wretched creature.

traits.locale_text: İnsanlar, aşağılık zenonun, yarattığı vahşetin cezasını mürettebatın elinde çektiğini söylüyordu. Söylenene göre sefil yaratığa saldıracak kadar cesur olan ekipten onlarcası ölmüş ancak nihayetinde İnsanlığın düşmanını yakalayıp paramparça etmişler.
